item.description:
OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT

WHERE:Winchester, Mill Pond

WHEN: Sunday 7/29, 3 p.m.-6 p.m.

THE SCENE: A small pond surrounded by weeping willows, lush foliage, an old bridge, with a scenic island with footbridge upon which we can paint

WHERE TO MEET: The parking lot next to the pond.

DIRECTIONS: Drive to the small Winchester Center. From route 93 it's 3 miles, from route 128 it's 6 miles. In the center, drive to the rotary then find the Starbucks 100 feet from the rotary. Put Starbucks on your right. Continue past starbucks to the lights 100 feet away. Our pond is on your left. Take a left at the lights and drive 1/4 mile to the next light. Take a left at those lights and your next left is our parking lot.

OTHER:
It's best to let us know you are coming so we can look for you or alert you to any changes.
If you have any questions about what to bring, don't hesitate to ask.
If you become lost getting there, call.
item.name: OUTING: Sunday 7/29, 3 p.m. Wincester
